hooks.command: VAULT="/Users/kriscard/obsidian-vault-kriscard"; TODAY=$(date +%Y-%m-%d); DOW=$(date +%u); DAILY="$VAULT/1 - Notes/Daily Notes/$TODAY.md"; MISSING=""; [ ! -f "$DAILY" ] && MISSING="daily"; if [ "$DOW" = "1" ]; then WEEK=$(date +%G-W%V); WEEKLY="$VAULT/1 - Notes/Weekly Notes/$WEEK.md"; [ ! -f "$WEEKLY" ] && MISSING="${MISSING:+$MISSING and }weekly"; fi; [ -n "$MISSING" ] && echo "Tip: Run /daily-startup to create your $MISSING note." || true
